page.title: 13Crockenhill Primary school
page.content: Today the school has 145 pupils with about 60% coming from the village and rest from outlying farms and Swanley.The school has 5 members of staff and a variety of teaching aids including a computer. The children were asked a series of questions about their lives.Most of them get up at about 7am and have a breakfast of cereal (the favourites being Sugar Puffs and Coco Pops)and toast.They generally leave for school between 8.15am and 8.30am.Most of them enjoyed school especially the active subjects like art and P.E..They arrived home at about 4.15pm and played outside in the summer and watched the TV.in winter.They liked cartoons and action series like "the A team".They had a hot meal in the evenings and their favourites were hamburgers and chips.Most of them went to bed at 8pm.
